attributes.action: Call for a Second Referendum not an Election
attributes.additional_details:
Keeping the country in this status is hurting economy and causing more damage then a potential no deal.

A new hung parliament/ single majority parliament will not solve this issue as the MP's within the party's have different views on Brexit.

It's time to check what people want and implement whatever they say without delay.  If MP s don't agree what people say then they can resign as they are not honouring a democratic decision.
attributes.background:
Calling for a 2nd election will not help resolving the Brexit issue. Let people decide what they want. 

It's not ideal to call for 2nd referendum but 3 years after the 1st one parliament is not sure what we (they) want. Give the choice to people and do whatever people say no if no but.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the options in a second referendum to be.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.  If you start a new petition, you'll need to make sure it includes a full name.
